section.section: A premium finance agreement shall be dated and signed by or on behalf of the insured.
The printed part of the premium finance agreement shall be in approximately 8-point type and be easily readable by an average individual.
The items set out in subsection (b)(5) of this section need not be stated in the sequence in which they appear.
Additional items may be included to explain the computations made in determining the amount to be paid by the insured.

text.section: A premium finance agreement may provide for additional insurance premiums to be financed and added to the initial premium finance agreement.
